title: "You only need to click once, FOOL." In or out?
body: Just rip the bandaid off for me please, did you Riot folks keep the iconic line?

replies.body: Out. RIP. (I loved the line for nostalgia, but it... really doesn't fit. T_T)
Wouldn't it be possible to play the voice line if you pressed any skill more than once?
Oh no, one of my favorite lines!!
even as a private joke with skin using keyboard? (or with esport oriented stuff generally)

"*It's cold out there...*" 
"*DON'T make the yeti angry. You won't like him when he's angry.*" 

"*Such Noobs, will matchmaking ever find true balance?*" 
I could list a few more iconic lines taken harshly by VGUs. Even Ezreal's lost a few great ones. 

Point is, that one is almost surely gone. It doesn't belong with his new design and place in the lore.

> [{quoted}](name=Kazekiba,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=HWVMP5q8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-05-29T19:08:30.755+0000)
>
> "*It's cold out there...*" 
> "*DON'T make the yeti angry. You won't like him when he's angry.*" 
> 
> "*Such Noobs, will matchmaking ever find true balance?*" 
> I could list a few more iconic lines taken harshly by VGUs. Even Ezreal's lost a few great ones. 
> 
> Point is, that one is almost surely gone. It doesn't belong with his new design and place in the lore.

Again - I said the same thing the Rioter did. 
I mentioned a few lines that VOs did away with, and said that it was likely Morde lost his, as well.... 

So why the 3 downvotes?
{{champion:20}} "It's cold... I'm glad you're here, Willump!"

> [{quoted}](name=Kazekiba,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=HWVMP5q8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-05-29T19:08:30.755+0000)
>
> "*It's cold out there...*" 
> "*DON'T make the yeti angry. You won't like him when he's angry.*" 
> 
> "*Such Noobs, will matchmaking ever find true balance?*" 
> I could list a few more iconic lines taken harshly by VGUs. Even Ezreal's lost a few great ones. 
> 
> Point is, that one is almost surely gone. It doesn't belong with his new design and place in the lore.

Are they really iconic? Or just annoyingly repetitive to the point of being cemented in our mind because we had no choice?

I would say Ezreals' museum meme is iconic because Riot and others would refer back to it but most of these old lines are only iconic because the champion had like 15 voice lines to begin with.
